text: 2.5-6 Jon 5.41, 5.44, Apo 20.33, Lom 1.9, 1 Ko 9.1-6, 2 Ko 11.9, 1 Te 2.10, 2 Te 3.8-9, 2 Pi 2.3 Nɨbi ke anɨb okok mɨdupsek nepɨm. Takaw ñɨg lɨl agon chɨnop nɨgem tep gɨnɨmuŋ agɨl nɨbop ma agñɨnok. Pen tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl akaŋ, yɨb awl dun agɨl nɨbop ma agñɨnok, binɨb okok kɨlop ma agñɨnok ak, God ne abe nɨŋɨd, chɨn anɨgɨpun ak mɨseŋ agñub.
